original_title: 名作復活！！中華なると原作 人気コミック「義父」シリーズの初期作品を再実写化！！ 義父 ～百合子～ 森ほたる
overview: That masterpiece is live-action again! The popular comic "Father-in-Law ~ Yuriko ~" based on Chuka is back with Madonna's exclusive H-cup beautiful mature woman, Hotaru Mori! Jiro Samon, a father-in-law who is lustful for his son's wife, Yuriko. He was indulging in delusions of playing with her lewd body, but that was the limit of his patience. Unbearable, he attacks Yuriko... Unable to resist the suddenness, Yuriko is swept away by the pleasure of the cock that violently pushes into her vagina. By Shamon Jiro's hands, she was gradually trained and developed into a body that her husband could not satisfy.
title: A Masterpiece Revival!! Story By Naruto Chuka The Popular Comic Series 'My Stepfather' Is Now A Live-Action Adaptation For The First Time Ever!! Father In Law - Yuriko - Hotaru Mori
